amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, requires the Department of Defense to transport the remains of service members by air to the military or civilian airport nearest to the place selected by the family.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 110-151 to require the Department of Defense to transport remains of service members by air to the airport nearest to the intended place of burial.
